code: import ReactDOM from'react-dom';import{ChakraProvider}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{Provider}from'react-redux';import{createStore,applyMiddleware,combineReducers}from'redux';import{createLogger}from'redux-logger';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{requestUserData,inputLoginDetails,submitRegisterDetails,inputRegisterDetails}from'./redux/reducers';import'./index.css';import App from'./App';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var logger=createLogger();var rootReducer=combineReducers({requestUserData:requestUserData,inputLoginDetails:inputLoginDetails,inputRegisterDetails:inputRegisterDetails,submitRegisterDetails:submitRegisterDetails});var saveState=function saveState(state){try{var serializedState=JSON.stringify(state);localStorage.setItem('linguo-state',serializedState);}catch(_unused){}};var loadState=function loadState(){try{var serializedState=localStorage.getItem('linguo-state');if(serializedState===null){return undefined;}return JSON.parse(serializedState);}catch(err){return undefined;}};var persistedState=loadState();export var store=createStore(rootReducer,persistedState,applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));store.subscribe(function(){return saveState(store.getState());});ReactDOM.render(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChakraProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Provider,{store:store,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(App,{})})}),document.getElementById('root'));
